title: Format Request Webhook
description: Webhook payload sent by seller agent to request a new format be built from the creative set's assets. Only processed if creative set has allow_format_requests enabled.

creative_set_id.description: The creative set to build from

media_buy_id.description: The media buy this format is needed for

seller_agent_url.description: URL of the seller agent making this request

callback_url.description: URL to notify when the format is ready
